title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Skills: Mobile Microlearning Course Based on Mathematical Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and proficiency in mobile device utilization
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze real-life social issues through mathematical inquiry processes.
Learners can design mathematical models by applying the four-stage inquiry model (Question-Hypothesis-Experiment-Conclusion) in mobile environments.
Learners can improve their mathematical self-efficacy by at least 15% after inquiry-based activities.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
